  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRep

      public CompanyRep(String userID, String name, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Constructor with default password
      Parameters:
      userID - unique ID for the company representative
      name - full name of the company representative
      companyName - name of the company
      department - department within the company
      position - position held by the representative

    • CompanyRep

      public CompanyRep(String userID, String name, String companyName, String department, String position, String password)
      Constructor with specified password
      Parameters:
      userID - unique ID for the company representative
      name - full name of the company representative
      companyName - name of the company
      department - department within the company
      position - position held by the representative
      password - password for the representative's account
